flags.title: Unpublished
flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to build a laser-cut sign by cutting letters through a solid piece of plastic.
lines.text_raw: This tutorial demonstrates how to build a laser-cut sign by cutting letters through a solid piece of plastic.

lines.text: Using LaserCute's online text designer add two blocks of text, position them on the surface and select fonts and sizes.
lines.text_raw: Using [http://www.LaserCute.com/Text|LaserCute's online text designer] add two blocks of text, position them on the surface and select fonts and sizes.

lines.text: You can get just one layer with letters cut through or you can also get a base layer in a different color. For this sample we will need a base layer so make sure you check this checkbox.
lines.text_raw: You can get just one layer with letters cut through or you can also get a base layer in a different color. For this sample we will need a base layer so make sure you check this checkbox.

lines.text: Preview carefully! Different browsers render fonts differently, so the design stage is not always 100% accurate. What you see in the preview is what you will actually get.
lines.text_raw: Preview carefully! Different browsers render fonts differently, so the design stage is not always 100% accurate. What you see in the preview is what you will actually get.

lines.text: These are the tools you will need: glue and tweezers. This kind of sign is very easy to assemble; you can use pretty much any glue.
lines.text_raw: These are the tools you will need: glue and tweezers. This kind of sign is very easy to assemble; you can use pretty much any glue.

lines.text: This is how it is shipped: with protective film, and the letters are all secured with tape.
lines.text_raw: This is how it is shipped: with protective film, and the letters are all secured with tape.

lines.text: Remove protective film from both layers.
lines.text_raw: Remove protective film from both layers.

lines.text: Glue the layers together. Wait for glue to set.
lines.text_raw: Glue the layers together. Wait for glue to set.

lines.text: Finally, install the small missing pieces. You may need tweezers.
lines.text_raw: Finally, install the small missing pieces. You may need tweezers.

lines.text: This is what the end result looks like. You will also have all the cut-out letters; you can install them somewhere as well!
lines.text_raw: This is what the end result looks like. You will also have all the cut-out letters; you can install them somewhere as well!

guide.summary: Create a professional laser-cut sign using online tools.
guide.title: Plastic Sign
